name: Collecting the psychophys data
description: Use the 'Checklist' to track your progress in setting up the lab for each participant
Printed copies are in the black letter trays in the lab
On SharePoint found in 'Printed' under '2020 Document and Protocol'

name: Setting up BIOPAC
description: Enter the testing room 133b and find the BIOPAC machine at the back
Turn on the machine by pressing the button at the back on the left inwards
Switch air conditioning on

name: Setting up computer
description: The control computers are back out in the main room at the back on the left
The computer on the right is the Acqknowledge/BIOPAC machine
Switch this computer on (ensure you do this after turning the BIOPAC on)
The password is 'eeg'
There is a folder on the desktop called 'BA Grant'
This folder contains the template graph and a folder called 'Data' with the data in
Open Acknowledge

name: Setting up AcqKnowledge
description: Open the template graph so that you can see channels for the ECG (heart rate), SCR (skin conductance) and trigger
Save as a new file in 'BA Grant/Data' with the participant number
As the experiment runs you will likely need to recenter the SCR vertically using the outlined button
To zoom out and view the whole experiment on screen click the button to the right

name: Changing the acquisition time
description: The default collection length is 30minutes with AcqKnowledge so the recording will stop during the experiment
To do this, click 'MP160'
Then click 'Set Up Data Aquisition...
Increase the 'Aquisition Time' to '7200' seconds
Then you can close the window
When you are have placed the sensors on the participant and are ready to begin recording, press 'Start'

name: Sensors
description: The heart rate sensors are disposable and stored in the cupboard on the left as you enter the main 133 room
You will need two for each participant
Place these, the alcohol and the Q-tips in the testing room ready
The skin conductance sensors are washed between participants and will be on the drying rack by the sink
Collect one (of two) of these wires and plug into the BIOPAC machine in channel 6 (no tape goes in middle)
Instructions for placing the sensors on the participant are in the protocol folder (and speak to Anke)

name: End of testing
description: After each participant, unplug the sensors, bin the heart rate and wash the skin conductance
At the end of the day, turn off machines and the air conditioning
Then back the participant files up onto the harddrive and sharepoint (see separate tutorial)
You will likely have to do this via memory stick as the machine did not recognise harddrive
